source.name: Transparency and Compliance in Asset Tokenization
source.instructions: Which of the following statements accurately describe the transparency and compliance features of asset tokenization? Select all that apply.

answers.answer: Blockchain technology in asset tokenization enables real-time tracking and monitoring of transactions
Tokenization can embed compliance rules directly into tokens or smart contracts, enhancing regulatory adherence
Asset tokenization automatically ensures full compliance with all global financial regulations
Real-time monitoring in tokenization can improve the ability of stakeholders to verify transactions
Tokenization eliminates the need for auditing in financial transactions

source.guidance: This question assesses understanding of transparency and compliance aspects in asset tokenization. The correct options highlight key features: real-time tracking enabled by blockchain, embedding of compliance rules, and improved transaction verification. The incorrect options address misconceptions: tokenization doesn't automatically ensure compliance with all regulations globally, and it doesn't eliminate the need for auditing. Instead, it can enhance these processes. This question encourages critical thinking about how tokenization can improve transparency and compliance while recognizing its limitations.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT evaluate the transparency and compliance aspects of asset tokenization
